PHRASE.LANG: Comfortably sharing tight spaces is the essence of comradeship and there's no better place to do this while riding into combat than in the armoured hull of the LoggerHead. With a rugged chassis, 81mm smoke grenade launchers and a turret bristling with weaponry, this APC is sure to leave a marked impression on your foes. [#Legal]

Le partage d'espaces étriqués est l'essence de la camaraderie et vous ne trouverez pas de meilleur endroit pour en profiter au combat que dans la carcasse blindée du LoggerHead. Avec son châssis épuré, ses lance-grenades de 81 mm et une tourelle hérissée de canons, ce VTT ne laissera pas vos ennemis indifférents. [#Legal]

Echte Kameraden haben kein Problem, sich auf engem Raum miteinander aufzuhalten, und wo könnte man das besser tun als auf dem Weg zum Schlachtfeld im gepanzerten LoggerHead. Mit der stabilen Karosserie, 81-mm-Rauchgranatwerfern und einem schweren Geschütz wird dieser MTW bei Ihren Feinden Eindruck machen. [#Legal]

Condividere gli spazi stretti è l'essenza del cameratismo e nella pancia corazzata di questo LoggerHead vivrete appieno questa esperienza. Il telaio irregolare, i lanciagranate da 81 mm per granate fumogene e la torretta carica di armamenti di questo APC lasceranno sicuramente il segno. [#Legal]

Poder compartir espacios estrechos con comodidad es la esencia de la camaradería, y para eso no hay mejor lugar que la cabina blindada del LoggerHead. Con un chasis reforzado, lanzagranadas de 81 mm y una torreta repleta de armamento, este APC dejará a tus enemigos boquiabiertos. [#Legal]
仲間意識を築くには狭いところにみんな閉じ込められるのが一番手っ取り早い。そしてLoggerHeadほど安心して乗れる乗り物も少ないだろう。頑丈なシャーシに81mmスモークグレネードランチャー、タレットと十分な火力を搭載した装甲兵員輸送車(APC)だ。 [#Legal]
협소한 공간에서도 기꺼이 동승할 수 있는 것. 그것이 바로 전우애입니다. "로거헤드" 안에서는 자신의 전우애를 시험할 기회가 충분합니다. 강인한 구조, 81mm 연막탄 발사기, 그리고 탄약으로 가득 들어찬 포탑. 적에게 강한 인상을 남기는 장갑차입니다. [#Legal]

Comfortably sharing tight spaces is the essence of comradeship, and there’s no better place to do this while riding into combat than in the armored hull of the LoggerHead. With a rugged chassis, 81mm smoke grenade launchers and a turret bristling with weaponry, this APC is sure to leave a marked impression on your foes. [#Legal]
這款APC底盤堅固，擁有81mm煙霧彈發射器和佈滿武器的炮塔，絕對讓敵人留下深刻印象。 [#Legal]
這款APC底盤堅固，擁有81mm煙霧彈發射器和佈滿武器的炮塔，絕對讓敵人留下深刻印象。 [#Legal]

Comfortably sharing tight spaces is the essence of comradeship, and there’s no better place to do this while riding into combat than in the armored hull of the LoggerHead. With a rugged chassis, 81mm smoke grenade launchers and a turret bristling with weaponry, this APC is sure to leave a marked impression on your foes. [#Legal]
